summary: Experienced finance professional with over 25 years of experience in financial analysis and reporting, auditing, and consulting. Result-oriented team leader with extensive international experience in managing large teams, responsible for developing team and individual capabilities. A high degree of demonstrated ability to easily adapt to new cultures and continuous exposure to stakeholders such as board of directors, investors and the financial community. Fluent in Dutch, English, Portuguese, and Spanish with intermediate abilities in German.

Mitigated a series of identified business risks, including Transfer Pricing, financial exposures and others as well as co-leading the regional restructuring, resulting in cost savings of USD 4 million and driving a new strategy for the Hub.', 'title': 'Finance Director Americas', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 284623, 'name': 'Nexa Resources', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQFNfELkSmUadg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688407941338?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=P_roNUiURN9F6KtsoKEX09XQEvinIoTl3ChJj2tjo6g', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nexa-resources/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Nexa Resources', 'description': "Responsible for internal (management) and external reporting and capital expenditures management  at Votorantim Metais Corporate headoffice in São Paulo. Leading a team of apr. 100 people that is responsible for providing adequate financial information to the Company's Management and other relevant governing bodies, providing adequate and compliant financial reporting to the Company's external stakeholders. Activities also include anual budgetting, planning and analysis and management of CAPEX for all businesses reporting to the corporate headoffice, including the Aluminium, Zinc, Niquel business and foreign operations in Peru and the US. 

Achievements:
- Pushed for cost optimization initiatives, zero based budgeting and sought leaner staff structures, leading to savings of USD 12 million (10% of budget). 
- Provided guidance on liquidity and working capital management, establishing goals, procedures and work groups as well as developing financial instruments to support the execution as well as hedging exposure to price and currency risk. As a result, working capital was reduced by USD 70 million or 45% for the period between 2015 and 2017. 
- Employed tax planning initiatives and managing the tax risk exposure according to corporate guidelines.
- Directly involved in preparation of business cases for strategic partnerships and carve-outs, such as energy-generating assets/plants, as well as divestment initiatives of non-strategic business units.
- Directly involved in various funding transactions/bond issuance, including preparation for roadshows and other interactions with investor community.
- One of the principal drivers in the IPO process of Nexa, culminating in a dual listing on NYSE and Toronto in 2017.
- Member of the Ethics Committee and main contact for/Secretary of Audit Committee.", 'title': 'Head of Corporate Financial Planning & Control', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 469600, 'name': 'Votorantim Cimentos', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQG4p4Qi_HBhpg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688675346599?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Q7l95kAqLAExnlP2AT385SWnvwqAEkqRd9l9AkhBFgA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/vcimentosoficial/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Votorantim Cimentos', 'description': "Responsible for financial reporting, management reporting, internal controls, Risk Management, Compliance, and Capital Expenditures. Leading a team of apr. 30 people at Votorantim Cimentos Corporate headoffice in São Paulo, with frequent interaction with the Company's regions in North America and Europe, Africa and Asia. Responsible for providing adequate financial information to the Company's managing and other relevant governing bodies, maintaining and improving the Company's Corporate Governance and internal control structure, and providing adequate and compliant financial reporting to the Company's external stakeholders.

- One of the responsible team members in the preparation of a potential IPO and debt issuances, including enhancement of governance, external reporting and offering memorandum. Continuous involvement in M&A and due diligence activities for both divestment and investment opportunities. 
- Supported the implementation of Enterprise Risk Management methodology in the Company and its subsidiaries, improving the visibility of business and strategic risks.
- Implemented tax planning initiatives, generating savings of apr. USD 5 million for the period between 2013 and 2015, at the same time managing the tax risk exposure according to corporate guidelines.
